messages.message: Hello czar :) I think we should discuss a few things. A dmz of Silesia and Prussia would benefit us both. Let me know what you think. Also, there are plenty of joint risks to us both, particularly as the game progresses. Let me know if you've got any interest working together
messages.input: Message from GERMANY:'Hello czar :) I think we should discuss a few things. A dmz of Silesia and Prussia would benefit us both. Let me know what you think. Also, there are plenty of joint risks to us both, particularly as the game progresses. Let me know if you've got any interest working together'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Germany's proposal for a demilitarized zone (DMZ) in Silesia and Prussia along with the mention of joint risks indicates a collaborative and cooperative approach, suggesting a genuine interest in working together for mutual benefit and long-term strategic success.

messages.message: Hm I'm getting your messages only in email form. Not to worry. Yes, I did say Prussia in my original message. I think the Baltic sea sounds fair enough as well. Why don't we work together toward those ends? I'm not shocked at the idea Britain might be looking to come for me
messages.input: Message from GERMANY:'Hm I'm getting your messages only in email form. Not to worry. Yes, I did say Prussia in my original message. I think the Baltic sea sounds fair enough as well. Why don't we work together toward those ends? I'm not shocked at the idea Britain might be looking to come for me'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Germany's acknowledgment of the proposal for a DMZ in Prussia and the Baltic Sea, as well as the understanding of the potential threat from Britain, reflects a consistent stance on cooperation with you. This continuity in their response indicates a genuine willingness to collaborate strategically and reinforces the reliability of their intentions.

messages.message:
Hi germany! Are you up for Sil as a DMZ? It would be in both of our best interests if we didn't get in a fight early on, as both of our great powers already have a lot to deal with on our sides of the map. Looking forwards to a great game!

-Russia
messages.input:
My response to GERMANY:'Hi germany! Are you up for Sil as a DMZ? It would be in both of our best interests if we didn't get in a fight early on, as both of our great powers already have a lot to deal with on our sides of the map. Looking forwards to a great game!

-Russia'.

messages.message: A DMZ of Prussia and the Baltic might also not hurt. And if you're up to it, maybe even a potential alliance against England?
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'A DMZ of Prussia and the Baltic might also not hurt. And if you're up to it, maybe even a potential alliance against England?'.

messages.message: I have heard some murmers of England wanting to attack you.
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'I have heard some murmers of England wanting to attack you.'.

messages.message: Also looking forward to a great game and a great alliance if we could hash something out :) did you get my earlier message in response to your last two messages I received by email
messages.input: Message from GERMANY:'Also looking forward to a great game and a great alliance if we could hash something out :) did you get my earlier message in response to your last two messages I received by email'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Germany's expression of anticipation for a great game and a potential alliance, along with the inquiry about previous email responses, indicates a positive and forward-thinking approach to collaboration. This consistent line of communication and interest in working together suggests a genuine intent to form a beneficial partnership.

messages.message: I did. Are you thinking of forging an alliance with France? If so that would be great since me and France are already on really good terms.
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'I did. Are you thinking of forging an alliance with France? If so that would be great since me and France are already on really good terms.'.

messages.message: Have you gotten my messages?
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'Have you gotten my messages?'.

messages.message: Yes, sorry. Been a bit busy. Well, you say messages. Before the. Message asking if I got your messages (plural) I received one about allying with France. Him and I definitely seem to be on good terms and I'm not looking for war with him. If we can work something out, I would love to be able to work with him.
messages.input: Message from GERMANY:'Yes, sorry. Been a bit busy. Well, you say messages. Before the. Message asking if I got your messages (plural) I received one about allying with France. Him and I definitely seem to be on good terms and I'm not looking for war with him. If we can work something out, I would love to be able to work with him.'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Germany's acknowledgment of receiving messages, including the discussion about potentially allying with France and the expressed desire to work together with France, indicates a transparent and open approach in the communication. This willingness to collaborate and form alliances aligns with the positive diplomatic interactions, fostering trust in the ongoing discussions.

messages.message: That would be great. Me and France are and you could be powerful allies, especially later in the game
